context: The Estonian word 'alla' is a versatile word that can function as an adverb, preposition, or postposition. Its core meaning relates to downward direction (down, to below), spatial relationships under something (under), and comparative quantities (less than, below). It has multiple uses including indicating physical position under objects (going under/behind something), describing lower values or quantities (prices going down, being below average), and appearing in many Estonian expressions and compound verbs.
